name: Polygon Wild West
description:
TPS low poly action game in the wild west. You will find everything that a true Western fan expects.
Duels of gunslingers, bank robberies, horse rides, train robberies, acquiring small towns. The real life of a rebellious cowboy is waiting for you.

An amazing campaign that reveals the story of the main character in front of you.
Lead him from the poor man to ruler of the west.

Features:
- world of the wild west
- robberies
- fun duels
- treasures
- power-ups

The best fun in beautiful low poly art placed in the wild west story.

Selected improvements and power-ups:
- Jetpack
- GodMode
- Loot Detector
- Unlimited Ammo

An amazing adventure is waiting for you.
